abstract: valueact holdings l. p. buys 7,642,835 shares of seagate technology plc .
article: valueact holdings l. p. raised its stake in shares of seagate technology plc by 55.3 % during the 3rd quarter , according to the company in its most recent 13f filing with the securities and exchange commission . the institutional investor owned 21,458,600 shares of the data storage provider 's stock after acquiring an additional 7,642,835 shares during the period . seagate technology comprises approximately 7.1 % of valueact holdings l. p. 's investment portfolio , making the stock its 7th largest holding . valueact holdings l. p. owned 7.42 % of seagate technology worth $ 711,782,000 as of its most recent filing with the securities and exchange commission .

a number of other large investors also recently modified their holdings of the business . wfg advisors lp increased its position in shares of seagate technology by 16,536.4 % during the 2nd quarter . wfg advisors lp now owns 3,660 shares of the data storage provider 's stock valued at $ 142,000 after purchasing an additional 3,638 shares during the last quarter . pacer advisors inc. . purchased a new stake in shares of seagate technology during the 2nd quarter valued at $ 150,000 . spiderrock advisors llc increased its position in shares of seagate technology by 2,419.5 % during the 3rd quarter .

spiderrock advisors llc now owns 5,568 shares of the data storage provider 's stock valued at $ 184,000 after purchasing an additional 5,347 shares during the last quarter . putnam fl investment management co. . purchased a new stake in shares of seagate technology during the 3rd quarter valued at $ 215,000 . finally , bourgeon capital management llc purchased a new stake in shares of seagate technology during the 3rd quarter valued at $ 249,000 . institutional investors and hedge funds own 91.76 % of the company 's stock . stx has been the subject of several recent research reports .

bidaskclub lowered seagate technology from a `` strong-buy '' rating to a `` buy '' rating in a report on tuesday , august 22nd . cleveland research lowered seagate technology from a `` neutral '' rating to an `` underperform '' rating in a report on wednesday , august 23rd . royal bank of canada reissued a `` hold '' rating and issued a $ 35.00 price objective on shares of seagate technology in a report on friday , september 1st . valuengine lowered seagate technology from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a report on friday , september 8th .

finally , jefferies group lowered seagate technology from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating and decreased their price objective for the stock from $ 40.00 to $ 29.00 in a report on monday , september 11th . four research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , twenty-two have assigned a hold rating , six have given a buy rating and three have given a strong buy rating to the stock . the company currently has a consensus rating of `` hold '' and an average target price of $ 41.53 . seagate technology plc opened at $ 40.49 on monday .

the company has a current ratio of 1.96 , a quick ratio of 1.55 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 4.03 . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 11,710.00 , a pe ratio of 9.90 , a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 0.54 and a beta of 1.67 . seagate technology plc has a twelve month low of $ 30.60 and a twelve month high of $ 50.96 . seagate technology last posted its earnings results on monday , october 23rd . the data storage provider reported $ 0.96 earnings per share for the quarter , beating the zacks ' consensus estimate of $ 0.86 by $ 0.10 .

the business had revenue of $ 2.63 billion during the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 2.54 billion . seagate technology had a return on equity of 84.50 % and a net margin of 7.41 % . the company 's quarterly revenue was down 5.9 % compared to the same quarter last year . during the same quarter in the previous year , the firm earned $ 0.99 eps . equities research analysts expect that seagate technology plc will post 3.99 earnings per share for the current fiscal year . the business also recently announced a quarterly dividend , which will be paid on wednesday , january 3rd .

shareholders of record on wednesday , december 20th will be issued a dividend of $ 0.63 per share . this represents a $ 2.52 dividend on an annualized basis and a yield of 6.22 % . the ex-dividend date is tuesday , december 19th . seagate technology 's payout ratio is presently 95.45 % . in other news , cfo david h. morton , jr. . sold 7,909 shares of seagate technology stock in a transaction dated monday , october 23rd . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 40.00 , for a total transaction of $ 316,360.00 .

following the completion of the sale , the chief financial officer now owns 25,561 shares in the company , valued at approximately $ 1,022,440 . the sale was disclosed in a filing with the sec , which is accessible through this hyperlink . also , insider jeffrey d. nygaard purchased 5,000 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction dated friday , october 27th . the shares were acquired at an average price of $ 37.38 per share , with a total value of $ 186,900.00 . the disclosure for this purchase can be found here . insiders have sold a total of 42,481 shares of company stock valued at $ 1,655,011 in the last ninety days .
